Welcome to BSU Open University’s terms of service! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

  1. You must be at least 18 years old to use our services.
  2. You may not use our services for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
  3. All content provided through our services is for educational purposes only and should not be used for any other purpose.
  4. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your account login information.
  5. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time if we suspect any unauthorized use.
  6. You must provide accurate and truthful information when signing up for our services.
  7. We do not guarantee that our services will be available at all times, and we are not responsible for any technical issues that may disrupt service.

By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.
